name: Complete Pre-Wash Scalp & Hair Strengthening Treatment Oil
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is:A quick and easy pre-wash treatment oil powered by stimulating rosemary extract that clarifies and soothes the scalp while adding strength to strands..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.Key Benefits:- Soothes scalp itching, flaking, and dryness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Rosemary Extract: Can aid scalp circulation, which supports hair follicles in the growth phase..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:You asked, JVN listened. This new and improved formula offers the same scalp-balancing benefits you know and love, while keeping this silicone-free treatment oil's golden hue crystal clear on your shelf. Calm itching, flaking, and irritation while strengthening strands for healthier hair from root to tip..Fragrance Description:A cozy blend of amber and cashmere musk is brightened with a splash of lemon and mandarin...Clinical Results:*Based on a 21 day consumer study of 38 subjects, used once weekly:.Planet Aware
ingredients: -Rosemary Extract: Can aid scalp circulation which supports hair follicles in the growth phase..-Turmeric Oil: A natural anti-inflammatory that helps reduce redness and irritation..-Hemisqualane: Improves hair health and strength right away and over time. Silicone alternative....Squalane, C13-15 Alkane*, Bisabolol, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Ocimum Basilicum Hairy Root Culture Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Melia Azadirachta Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Fragrance/Parfum, Tocopherol, Limonene, Linalool *Sugarcane Derived Hemisqualane...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Before washing hair, apply one to three droppers full directly to the scalp, adding more if needed. .-Gently massage into the scalp and leave on for 10 to 15 minutes. .-Use up to twice per week...JVN tip: .-Scalp still feel a little oily? Shampoo twice if needed. .. Recycling Instructions:.-Please refer to your local recycling center for guidance on how to recycle.                                                                                                                                                                                        -Glass bottle: 100% infinitely recyclable..-Dropper: Post-consumer recycled..-Outer packaging: FSC-certified with soy-based ink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has a very oily scalp, I did not think that I would enjoy this product. I got it as a sample in the mail asking me to review it and I was very skeptical at first. I was pleasantly surprised at what it did for my hair, and I will continue to use it. It’s a great treat yourself every now and then type of hair treatment before you get in the shower; not some thing I would use every day but some thing I would use 2 to 4 times a month as an extra treat for my hair. I will continue to purchase this product because I really do think it makes a difference in my hair. I was not paid for this review and these words are my own. I would recommend this product even if you have a very oily scalp like me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I have chronic dry skin from some health issues and this stuff helps hydrate my scalp so much. Plus, it smells amazing... it's the same scent as the serum. I have no idea what scent it is, but it smells great. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The results I get from using this oil once a week are amazing. My dry scalp absorbs the oil and it relieves redness and dryness almost immediately. It also helps remove any dry patches and residue before shampooing.

reviews.review_text: I love how it makes my scalp feel after shampooing and until my next shampoo. It keeps my hair less greasy and soft. I have Indian hair so it is hard to find oil products that work with my hair type but this one is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair

I highly highly recommend for healthier hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the old formula, but this new one is showing results FAST. I have noticed that my hair feels stronger and isn't falling out as much. This pre wash rinses great no oily feeling or look. 5 stars JVN this is a great pre wash !

reviews.review_title: JVN loves the fine hair girlies
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of love for JVN.  Every product I have purchased has worked really well for my very fine hair.  As a fine hair girlie, products can easily overwhelm my hair and weigh it down or make it feel dirty when its freshly clean so I have to be selective on ingredients and brands I use.  JVN is amazing.  Products are luxe, they smell amazing and do the job intended so incredibly well. I've used many scalp oils as well and this one just ticks all the boxes.  Feel nourishing going on, applicator is comfortable to use to apply directly to scalp and after washing my scalp feels balanced.  I love this product and everything from the JVN line so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After the first few tries, this definitely shows a lot of promise! I have a chronically dry scalp, but after the first three tries of this new formula my scalp is less itchy and flaky. I have a lot of hair, so it is a little hard to apply evenly on my whole head, but I have yet to find a product that doesn’t have a challenge in that aspect. Ultimately this will be something I use probably twice a week and dial it down to once to keep up on maintenance, so I could see the bottle lasting a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product because I love the JVN line and had success with their air dry cream and hair serum.  I have an itchy scalp at times, no flakes just itchy.  Maybe from holding the diffuser too close to my scalp which is always the last to dry.  I put 2-3 pipettes on my part and the too back and front of my scalp that is itchy.  I massaged it in and let it sit to work its magic for 15 minutes before getting into the shower.  I had no issues washing it out even though the directions said you may need to shampoo twice.  The great news is this stuff really works.  My scalp is no longer itchy.  I am using it weekly to keep my scalp healthy and moisturized.  If you have an itchy scalp give this product a try.  The company is very environmentally conscious which I also like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased the old version and was given the new version to review. I thought the old version was only ok, I never even finished the bottle to be totally honest. The new version, I absolutely adore though. It's more oily than the old one, so I have had to wash my hair twice when using it, which is why I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5. It smells a little citrus-y, whereas the old one had no distinct smell. I really like the new scent. But my hair! After using this, my hair was just so soft and it even helped with frizz. I was really surprised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: This product has absolutely changed my hair routine. After using it a couple times, I noticed how my hair is more shiny and stronger. Super easy to use.

reviews.review_title: Worth a Try for Soothed Scalp

reviews.review_title: Must have for my new routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Hesitant but glad I changed my mind!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the product that solidified my love for JVN! Seriously such an amazing pre-wash. The scent is also AMAZING!

reviews.review_title: Oily Girlies- This is a MUST!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me tell you! I have been on a hair care JOURNEY. I have fine, straight hair that has definitely changed over the years- it's a bit unbalanced with oiler roots and dryer ends. I discovered the JVN line in 2022 and all the items I tried have become a staple in my hair care routine: the leave-in instant recovery hair serum, air dry cream, blow out styling milk, and volumizing shampoo and conditioner. I did switch up my routine and removed the oil (due to personal reasons, not because of the product) and when I received this new, revamped version, I realized how much I missed it! It is soo nourishing to my scalp and my ends AND I can go longer between washes. The only noticeable difference was the scent. It's not as heavily scented as the bottles I've had before, and honestly, I actually prefer it this way as it is STILL an amazing product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love that JVN made this product. I hadn’t experienced scalp dryness and irritation until recently, and this has been a great product to nourish the scalp and also pamper myself. It smells so good, is easy to apply, and it encourages me to give myself a scalp massage, now a ritual I look forward to! It’s the golden elixir from Mt. Olympus, imo. Thanks for this stellar product, JVN!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was on my second bottle of the original formula when I received the second. Wow! Definitely feel it’s more effective than the original. I struggle with flakey hair and I’m on day 2 of not washing my hair, not a flake in sight.  The new formula is more golden than the second

reviews.review_title: Easy to use and hair feels great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: As a night time shower taker, I love this product! Definitely notice less frizz and more shine in the mornings after using this oil, plus it smells amazing. I skip one or two days between use, I don’t find I need it every day to reap the benefits of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually only wash one to two times a week because my scalp is dry. Usually, after I shampoo, my scalp feels extra dry, itchy, and tight. Helped clarify my scalp without stripping it. it was soothing, nourishing, and hydrating. My strands are dry and course. Added shine and hydration. My strands felt softer. I look forward to the added benefits and will continue to use.

reviews.review_title: didn't notice a big difference in the new formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this new scalp oil in the mail and asked to post a review. Keep in mind that I've only used it for one week, twice a week. the first day I used it I could immediately feel the oil breakdown all the buildup on my scalp. I did have to wash my hair three times to get the oil off, which I didn't particularly like, but my scalp did feel great afterwards. The minus one star comes from the fact that the next day my head was way to oily. This could have also been due to the extreme heat here in Texas. I don't really notice a big difference between the formulas and I will continue to use it and update my review. Thanks JVN Hair for sending me the free product.   I also have to add that anytime I use JVN products, air dry cream or Instant Recovery serum, the shampoo, etc. I always get compliments on my hair! I think this brand is doing a great job at making innovative affordable products. So thank you for keeping my hair healthy and shinny!

reviews.review_title: Pre-wash scalp oil for healthier hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like all JVN products this oil smells really nice. I let it sit for an hour which is longer than they suggest. My hair was smoother and less frizzy after washing. I often find my roots are really dry right after shampooing and this helped keep my hair more balanced. I recommend it! Pair it with the air dry cream which is my favorite JVN product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: [I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review]  As the headline says, I like it so far.  JVN addresses the black residue that occurs and changed the formula.  JVN states that the residue is due to the turmeric powder settling over time.  Now they’re using turmeric oil.   I can feel the difference in just the first use.  After the first shampoo, my hair didn’t feel stringy when rinsing.  It felt softer and supple.  After the 3rd shampoo/rinse, it felt slightly stringy, but not as much as the previous formula. I also felt my shampoo was able to clean my scalp better with this new formula.  It seems my shampoo, which has argan oil, was able to mix better with this new formula when massaging my scalp; therefore, rinsing was easier.   I’m rooting for this new formula.  My hair feels softer and cleaner with it.   (in the pic, the bottle on the left is the new formula, the bottle on the right is the old formula. You can see the color difference, which hopefully means a better emulsion of the turmeric. )
Love how this oil keeps my scalp fresh longer. My hair can get greasy within a day or two of washing. With this oil, my scalp stays fresh longer and it leaves my hair feeling smooth and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used this twice, and my hair is already silkier.  I also live in an extremely dry/no humid climate and ever since moving here, I struggle with itchy scalp/dandruff.  I haven't had that at all since using it.  I've tried several other prewash oils and they've either not helped, or been way too heavy, and this is the perfect in between!

reviews.review_title: Best thing to have and you only use twice a week!!

I did notice that on the bottle I was currently on there was some dark colored

reviews.review_title: Excited To Add This To My Routine!

reviews.review_text: Applying oil to oily hair has always been something that makes me a bit nervous. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product.  Really helped with itchy scalp and smells awesome!

reviews.review_text: I’ve been eyeing the scalp oil for a while and was really excited to give the new formula a try. I’ve always been worried to try scalp oils because my hair gets greasy easily. I’m impressed with this scalp oil though because it is not overly oily. There’s no strong smell either and it’s really easy to apply. I parted my hair and applied to the roots then rubbed it in. I also applied it to my ends like I saw JVN do in a TikTok and let it sit for 15 mins. It easily came off i. The shower and I didn’t need to wash twice. I have a lot of hair and have some breakage so looking forward to seeing it this scalp oil will help with some of that as well. After washing my hair felt soft and smooth and I had no problem styling either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to have been chosen to receive the new Pre-Wash Scalp Oil from JVN. I have fine hair that is medium in thickness but has always been thin at the scalp. My scalp isn’t dry or flakey, but it does often get itchy; so I was hoping this would help. So far, so good! Because my scalp does have the tendency to get oily, I will probably only use the oil once a week moving forward. I typically only wash my hair two to three times a week and have used this oil twice so far. My hair has been so smooth and shiny, and my scalp has felt cleaner than I expected it to. The scent is light and earthy but doesn’t linger. One thing I don’t like is that the dropper really only fills up half way, but not a deal breaker. I look forward to seeing how my scalp improves after continued use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried so many different oils to help relieve my dry scalp and I really love this one! It relieves the itchiness but doesn’t leave my hair feeling greasy.   I was raving about it to my husband and now he loves it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the new formula Pre-Wash Scalp Oil this past weekend and used it right away! I love how well this cleans my scalp of any buildup and soothes itchiness, but I was shocked to see how it actually started stimulating hair growth too!! Apparently the last formula showed signs of separation/residue at the bottom which I never noticed *shrugs* but I will say I felt like this formula helped make my hair SO shiny and my scalp felt so clean after first use. This product will always be in my possession and I can’t tell you how pleased I’ve been with every single JVN product I’ve tried since they were first released. These are the best hair products ever and I’ll be team JVN for life!! I’ve recruited friends, family, and even my friends’ boyfriends and they’re all hooked now.

I’m looking forward to continuing to incorporate this scalp oil into my the beginning of my hair washing routine! I can’t wait to see if it helps strengthen my hair over the next few months of use.

I've enjoyed using this the past week! Smells really good and washes out nicely. I'm excited to see the long term results

reviews.review_title: This stuff has been a lifesaver!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this product! I have definitely noticed serious improvements from regular use.   My scalp, overall, feels much cleaner and calmer. The skin on my scalp feels less congested and more clear.   I have some medication-related hair loss and breakage that was causing me a lot of stress, but I have noticed lots of new growth after using this for a few months, which is super encouraging! I am so grateful to feel like I have some control back over my hair growth and quality.  As a bonus, my hair feels softer and stronger in general.   I was worried that it would be a hassle to use, but it really feels like such a self-care moment. I have come to appreciate how it slows me down and gives me time to massage my scalp and sort of reconnect with myself during a busy day when I'm usually rushing around to get ready.   And I really love how trustworthy the ingredient list is and the knowledge that JVN is such an environmentally-conscious company.  The complete scalp oil is such a simple yet effective part of my hair routine... I can't believe I went so long without it! I'm on my 2nd bottle at home, and always bring the sample size along when I travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I apply this oil (3 droppers) and then go wild with a scalp massager, wait 15 minutes, then double wash + condition my hair and WOW. My scalp feels so much cleaner, and as a bonus I've got more volume from the roots and my hair is softer than when I use shampoo+conditioner only. I've been using the old formula for a year and a half and was sent the new formula last week to try out. I honestly expected it to perform the same, but the few times I've used the new formula so far I've legitimately noticed a bigger wow factor. I love this stuff!

The oil does make a huge difference and I literally bring it with me everywhere I go when I travel. I love the sturdy and sustainable packaging, and the airport-friendly size. ADORE THIS!

reviews.review_title: Smells good and is a nice bonus to your routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great. I have to use quite a few drops due to having lots of long hair. I don’t know if it’s doing anything for my hair but it’s a relaxing step while I prep for my shower. I use the JVN shampoo as my normal shampoo and this feels like a good combo but not necessary. If I used a cheap shampoo this would probably feel really good to help your hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used the original version of this product for a while and was excited to get to try the improved version. I have an oily scalp, so I was skeptical about using a pre wash oil but I think this make my hair shinier and helps tame my flyaways. I do find that sometimes I have to double wash to get rid of the extra oil, but this is probably because I don’t always wash my hair every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Happy so far! This new formula feels identical to the old one, it leaves my scalp clean and helps moisturize my hair. The difference claims to be that the oil won’t leave a sediment as it sits, which definitely happens with the old formula. I haven’t had it long enough for it to start separating, so whether or not that claim is true remains to be seen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have not been a fan of oils in the past because they left my hair feeling heavy and greasy. This product doesn’t leave residue, only softness.  My hair feels stronger and less brittle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have relaxed hair and have eczema on my scalp. Not only does the oil help reduce scalp odor, it also lifts my flakes without irritating my scalp. I have tried other viral scalp oils that claim to help your hair grow, but this one actually does for me! When I use JVN Complete Pre-Wash scalp oil, I truly have less breakage and my hair remains more hydrate for longer after washing. I buy this scalp oil two bottles at a time. Love it!

My favorite scalp oil- I've been using it for years! I like to use it 1-2 times a week and it always leaves my scalp feeling refreshed. After a day or two of no washing or just having it up in a bun/pony all day I love that this helps with any build up. I used to have issues in the winter with dry scalp but not anymore thanks to this! I also think it has helped with the overall strength of my hair as I have thin/fine hair and it used to break fairly easily. Would highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! A few drops goes a long way, let it sit in your hair for a bit before you shower and it works magic! I struggle with dry hair/scalp and this has been very helpful in adding some moisture back into my hair. From someone who bleaches her hair, I recommend this in your hair routine to add some moisture back in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this hair oil I saw a difference right away. I have a dry scalp with flaking and was excited to try this. 15 mins before showering I massaged this on. Normally, I shampoo twice however with the oil I did have to do another shampoo. Once my hair was dried I saw the difference in my scalp and hair! Scalp looked hydrated and hair lustrous. I was scared of using oil directly on my scalp but I look forward to the 2x weekly use. I included the before and after photos of my hair. Also usually I will see some flakes after washing my hair but with this everything washed off so nicely! No flakes!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had an oily scalp for as long as I can remember. I've tried different shampoos and other hair care products to help, but I never saw any actual improvement. Last week, I got back from a 12 day trip to Europe, and my hair was looking ROUGH by the end of it. So, I used this product for the first time since its reformulation, and it truly made a huge difference. My scalp was much less oily and flaky, and my hair has overall looked better. I am thoroughly impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a fan of hair oils normally as my hair is somewhat oily to start with.  JVN sent this to me as an unexpected try it and review it.  I was disappointed when I saw what it was but figured I should at least try it. Much to my surprise, this didn't leave my hair or scalp feeling oily at all.  In fact, my hair was more supple and less frizzy. It felt fuller and had a bit more volume as well. I did a bit of an experiment as I used it for one hair wash, didn't use it a few days later when I washed my hair, and used it again the next time I washed my hair. I could tell the difference and I prefer how my hair was when I used it. It will take a while to go through this bottle as you only need 2-3 droppers full but if it continues to perform as well as it has, I will absolutely buy more.

reviews.review_title: Use it properly and it’ll help you dearly!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this product last year and returned it because it made my scalp super oily (hair oil, makes sense lol). Turns out it was user error and I just didn’t know how to wash it out properly — even after 2 shampoo runs. But I tried it a second time because the product was sent to me and after watching a video on how to properly wash out hair oil, OMG best product for my hair right now! I have thick, plentiful, wavy hair and I’ve been struggling with a dry scalp lately. It moisturized my hair so well and left it shiny and soft. And my scalp was clear of dry flakes! I highly recommend as long as you use it properly and make sure you know how to wash out hair oil properly. Going to use again in the future for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a JVN customer since launch and have used the pre wash scalp oil numerous times. It’s always been a go to product for me as I have a dry scalp. The scalp oil was recently updated and it made the oil even better! This silicone free treatment oil really helps to nourish my dry scalp and I noticed less flaking and irritation when I use it. Also the smell is incredible!

reviews.review_title: Brought my hair back from the dead
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try this product almost out of desperation. My scalp was itchier than ever, my hair was falling out and had severe breakage. This scalp oil saved not only my hair but my sanity too. I like to leave it on my scalp as long as possible. Sometimes, If I wash my hair in the morning, I'll put it on before bed. Or in the morning if I know I am not going anywhere that day. I can immediately tell a difference in my hair if I stop using it. This has been my go-to product and I've recommended to all the women in my life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second bottle of this product! I’ve really enjoyed using it because I often have build up and or a dry scalp, so I like to add this to my routine. I’ve also liked having this to add some moisture to my scalp after some extra sun exposure. Excited to continue using this product as I love everything JVN!

reviews.review_title: An Oil That Will Work For Those Who Avoid Oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine, very very long hair. I typically avoid using oils (even at my scalp) because my hair gets greasy so quickly, but I've used this product for years to help my dry scalp without issue. I shampoo twice like I normally do and no excess oil gets left behind. The new formulation works just as well for me as the original, still looks pretty on my shelf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had a hair disaster. My hair was fried by the stylist, over bleached and over processed. This newly revamped version of the hair oil has saved my hair! I not only use the oil on my scalp, but have been treating my dry and brittle hair with it.  It smells amazing and

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the complete Pre-wash scalp & hair only for a week but I noticed from the fiirst application it is working. I highly recommend and good price, high quality product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't stop touching my hair after using this oil, it made my hair so soft. It's been especially helpful during the summer months when I spend most days in my pool. The oil washes out without leaving a heavy residue, and the scent is neutral and light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I’ve been using this for over a year and notice a big difference when i stop using it. Im able to go longer without washing and no scalp itch when i do use it. Great product and it smells wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been super great for my scalp! It has definitely improve my scalp.  My scalp used to be super dry but now its noy dry and yet not oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the previous formula but love the new formula even more. I'm taking a medication that is making my scalp very dry and this helps so much. Less flakes and itching. It also smells so good.

reviews.review_title: This treatment is the epitome of self-care!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A couple times a week be indulgent and take some time for YOU. This scalp oil feels so good, just a teensy tingle and warmth along with a light citrusy scent. It recommends leaving on for 10-15 minutes. I applied, taking time to massage my scalp and gently scratch with my fingernails. Then, I sat down and read a book! I took time out for 15 minutes to just relax and read a book and let this oil work its magic. Yes, this oil is moisturizing, yes, it nourishes your scalp, no it is not greasy but more than all of these obvious things, it gave me a time to truly relax. Don't waste this time staring at your device. Read a book, lay down in shavasana, sing! Whatever it is that makes you feel cared for, do it, while you use this treatment oil

I just got an undercut and this scalp oil really helped calm my angry scalp before a shower. I'm loving the smell and the way my hair looked afterwards. I used about 1.5 dropper fulls and didn't need to shampoo twice.

reviews.review_title: Try it for added luxury to your haircare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Love adding this product to my wash routine. I use it and do a scalp massage before washing. I've used both formulas and appreciate the addition of turmeric. The hemisqualane is also very nourishing. I have dry patches around my hairline and notice they flake less when I use this product. I would like a squeeze bottle with a nozzle for more precise application. The dropper and glass bottle can be a little cumbersome to manage. Overall, it's worth a try and a nice addition to level up a wash day routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I’m dealing with postpartum hair loss/breakage and flaky scalp, using this noticeably reduces the amount of hair fall and my flakes are so much better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: I really felt like this helped the itchiness I was having in my scalp. And, just after two uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had originally purchased this product (old formula) hoping it would help with my hair loss.  Although neither the old this new formula seemed to make a difference in regard to that, this new formula product does seem to nourish my scalp.  Also, I have oily hair and it did not make my scalp or hair oily at all and it washed out very easily, with just one washing.  This product does not have a strong scent either which is a bonus for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used both this updated version and the previous version. It has a nice smell—my hair and scalp feel generally healthy after using this. It can be tricky to know when it has fully washed out, but otherwise a good product.

reviews.review_title: Healthy hair starts with the scalp!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although I have several JVN products which I love, I was skeptical about this scalp oil. I was afraid that it would leave my hair looking or feeling greasy. Instead, it helped my scalp and my hair feel more moisturized without any oily look or feel after a normal shampoo and conditioning. I had experienced some mild flaking which was more noticeable because of my dark hair, but I have not noticed any flakes since using this product. I've also notice a bit less hair loss and breakage which is a great bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using JVN products for over 2 years now with Air dry cream being a must-have in my husband's hair routine.  I was a little skeptical of using a hair oil on my very fine hair. most oils usually weigh my hair down and are hard to wash off. not this one! I have to use an anti dandruff shampoo in my routine, which helps my scalp but leaves my hair all dry and frizzy. JVN Pre wash oil not only cleared up the build up, it made my hair so soft and manageable. I really like it so far :)

reviews.review_title: A Pre-Wash Staple For Healthy Hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The previous formula was incredible, and the newly updated formula is even more incredible! I’ve used the oil for a few months now, and apply every other day and leave on for a bit longer than the recommend time. It has helped reduce the amount of hair fall and breakage when I brush and wash my hair, and helps with my occasionally itchy scalp. I have naturally oily hair, and this oil surprisingly helps make my hair feel extra clean when I wash it which helps stretch my time between washes to every other day instead of daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this oil a few times a week since the original product was released. I have an oily scalp and it actually helps to wash away the build up and keep my scalp nice and clear. I’ve tried other scalp oils and they just don’t wash out for me and I’m left super greasy even with a double cleanse. This one washes away cleanly. The fragrance on the updated product is the same as the original which I know is important to some people(the updated moisture line is not for me).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had used this in the past and was excited to see they have updated it. I use it 1-2 times a week and have noticed such great change in my hair and scalp. I’ve also noticed less breakage with my thin hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a more sensitive scalp with frequent itching and flaking. I already use a dandruff treatment once a week but was excited to add this to my routine. The scent is light and pleasant and the dropper makes this oil so easy to apply directly to the scalp especially since I have long, thick hair. I massage it in to my scalp and let it sit for 15 minutes before showering. I was pleasantly surprised that this oil not oily soothes my scalp but clarifies and hydrates it. After the second use, I noticed fewer flakes and less scalp itching. My hair also feels softer and looks shinier. This is definitely being added to my hair care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I recommended everyone with the original formula and will continue to do so with the new formula. It leaves my hair looking voluminous, healthy and makes me feel confident. would

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this pre-wash scalp oil!  I’ve used the older version of this oil and the new formula is great.  If my scalp is feeling dry I’ll put this on for 15 minutes before showering, and shampoo once.  This helps get rid of scalp dryness and makes my hair more shiny and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Helps keep hair feeling nourished and shiny! Even than the previous iteration of the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my third bottle of this product!! I have an oily scalp that is sensitive and was skeptical of a pre wash oil but this has helped so much. I use it once a week and my scalp loves it. Removes any buildup and allows me to get an extra day between washing. I can totally tell a difference in my scalp and hair health when I use this regularly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had the original formula a while back, and it was good, but this new formula is noticeably better. I have an oily scalp, and it's often difficult for me to get my hair really feeling clean. I could feel the scalp oil starting to work as I applied it, and it felt and smelled so good while I waited the 15 minutes before washing. I kept the rest of my routine the same as usual, and my hair feels truly clean, but also silkier than before. I also love how little product is needed for each use, so it lasts a while. It's quick, simple, and affordable, but it feels like a luxury item. It instantly became an absolute must have for me.

reviews.review_title: New go to for my wash routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my scalp feel clean and moisturized when doing a wash. Also noticed my hair felt smoother and less frizzy after wash routine.  Will be a go to moving forward to take care of my hair!

reviews.review_text: I’ve purchased the previous formula a couple of times,  and excited to use the new formula.  I love to use it especially when I use a lot of products on my hair.  It leaves my hair clean and have less flaking.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my hair care routine
reviews.review_text: Currently on my second bottle of this scalp oil & will definitely continue to repurchase! I have a very oily scalp and using this once a week has helped to reduce buildup & oiliness so that I’m able to go longer between washes.     between
